+    <string-array name="act_set_pref_test_situation_entries_labels">

+        <item>SQC</item>
+        <item>Debug</item>
+        <item>Cust</item>
+    </string-array>

+        <item>0</item>
+        <item>1</item>
+        <item>2</item>
+        <item>3</item>
+    </string-array>
+    <string-array name="act_set_pref_test_situation_entries_summaries">
+        <item>Salida de registro mínima</item>
+        <item>Más registro pero mantener el buen rendimiento</item>
+        <item>Registro máximo con una degradación del rendimiento</item>
+        <item>Utilizar configuración de registro autodefinida</item>
+    </string-array>
+
+    <!-- config cust path -->

+    <string name="act_set_pref_btsc_cust_path_summary">%1$s</string>
+    <!--

+    <string name="act_set_pref_btfc_cust_path_summary">%1$s</string>
+    -->
+
+    <!-- system tool -->
+    <string name="act_set_pref_systool_open_mtklogger_title">Abrir MtkLogger</string>
+    <string name="act_set_pref_systool_open_mtklogger_summary">Ingrese a la pantalla de Inicio de MtkLogger</string>
+    <string name="act_set_pref_systool_open_engmode_title">Abrir modo de ingeniero</string>

+    <string name="act_set_prefs_bluetooth">Outil de consignation Bluetooth</string>

+    </string-array>

+        <item>Consignation plus détaillée en préservant les performances</item>
+        <item>Consignation maximale au détriment des performances</item>
+        <item>Utiliser la configuration de consignation autodéfinie</item>
+    </string-array>

+    -->

+    <string name="act_set_pref_systool_open_mtklogger_summary">Accéder à l’écran d’accueil de MtkLogger</string>
+    <string name="act_set_pref_systool_open_engmode_title">Ouvrir le mode Ingénieur</string>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+   <!-- MTK resource -->
+   <string name="alerts">Alertas</string>
+    <string name="select_all">Selecionar tudo</string>
+    <string name="unselect_all">Desmarcar todas</string>
+    <string name="delete">Excluir</string>
+    <string name="select_cellbroadcasts">Selecione o alerta de emergência</string>
+
+    <plurals name="message_view_selected_message_count">
+        <item quantity="one"><xliff:g example="1" id="message_count">%d</xliff:g> selecionada(s)</item>
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g example="9" id="message_count">%d</xliff:g> selecionada(s)</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <plurals name="confirm_delete_broadcast">
+        <!-- Case of 1 result. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 Mensagem de difusão selecionada será excluída</item>
+        <!-- Case of 0 or 2 or more results. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g example="15" id="number">%1$s</xliff:g> mensagens de difusão selecionadas serão excluídas</item>
+    </plurals>
+
+    <string name="enable_cmas_presidential_threat_alerts_title">Mostrar Alerta presidencial</string>
+    <string name="enable_cmas_presidential_threat_alerts_summary">Exibir alertas de nível presidencial</string>
+
+    <string name="enable_cmas_imminent_threat_alerts_title">Alerta iminente</string>
+    <string name="enable_cmas_imminent_threat_alerts_summary">Exibir alertas de ameaças iminentes à vida e à propriedade</string>
+
+    <string name="cmas_preview_alert_tone_title">Visual. prévia toque alerta</string>
+    <string name="cmas_preview_alert_tone_summary">Visualizar toque de alerta</string>
+
+    <string name="cmas_change_settings">Tem certeza de que deseja alterar as configurações?</string>
+    <string name="cmas_disable_cmas">Nenhum alerta será recebido se você desativar a mensagem de difusão.</string>
+    <string name="cmas_enable_cmas_failed">Falha ao abrir.</string>
+
+    <string name="enable_repeat_alert_title">Repetir alarme</string>
+    <string name="enable_repeat_alert_summary">Lembrar o usuário do alerta não lido de forma intermitente</string>
+    <string name="enable_all_alert_title">Todos os alertas sobre</string>
+    <string name="enable_all_imminent_alerts_title">Todas as mensagens de ameaça/alerta</string>

+    <string name="alert_sound_volume">Volume de som de alerta</string>
+    <string name="alert_volume_summary">Ajustar volume do som de alerta</string>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+   <!-- MTK resource -->
+   <string name="alerts">Alerts</string>
+    <string name="select_all">Select all</string>
+    <string name="unselect_all">Deselect all</string>
+    <string name="delete">Delete</string>
+    <string name="select_cellbroadcasts">Select emergency alert</string>
+
+    <plurals name="message_view_selected_message_count">
+        <item quantity="one"><xliff:g example="1" id="message_count">%d</xliff:g> selected</item>
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g example="9" id="message_count">%d</xliff:g> selected</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <plurals name="confirm_delete_broadcast">
+        <!-- Case of 1 result. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 selected alert message will be deleted</item>
+        <!-- Case of 0 or 2 or more results. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g example="15" id="number">%1$s</xliff:g> selected alert messages will be deleted</item>
+    </plurals>
+
+    <string name="enable_cmas_presidential_threat_alerts_title">Show presidential alert</string>
+    <string name="enable_cmas_presidential_threat_alerts_summary">Display presidential level alerts</string>
+
+    <string name="enable_cmas_imminent_threat_alerts_title">Imminent Alert</string>
+    <string name="enable_cmas_imminent_threat_alerts_summary">Display alerts for imminent threats to life and property</string>
+
+    <string name="cmas_preview_alert_tone_title">Alert tone preview</string>
+    <string name="cmas_preview_alert_tone_summary">Preview the alert tone</string>
+
+    <string name="cmas_change_settings">Save changes?</string>
+    <string name="cmas_disable_cmas">No alerts will be received if you disable Cell Broadcast</string>
+    <string name="cmas_enable_cmas_failed">Couldn\u2019t open</string>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+   <!-- MTK resource -->
+   <string name="alerts">Alertes</string>
+    <string name="select_all">Tout sélectionner</string>
+    <string name="unselect_all">Tout désélectionner</string>
+    <string name="delete">Supprimer</string>
+    <string name="select_cellbroadcasts">Choisir l’alerte d’urgence</string>
+
+    <plurals name="message_view_selected_message_count">
+        <item quantity="one"><xliff:g example="1" id="message_count">%d</xliff:g> sélectionné</item>
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g example="9" id="message_count">%d</xliff:g> sélectionnés</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <plurals name="confirm_delete_broadcast">
+        <!-- Case of 1 result. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 message d’alerte sélectionné va être supprimé.</item>
+        <!-- Case of 0 or 2 or more results. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g example="15" id="number">%1$s</xliff:g> messages d’alerte sélectionnés vont être supprimés.</item>
+    </plurals>
+
+    <string name="enable_cmas_presidential_threat_alerts_title">Afficher l’alerte présidentielle</string>
+    <string name="enable_cmas_presidential_threat_alerts_summary">Afficher les alertes de niveau présidentiel</string>
+
+    <string name="enable_cmas_imminent_threat_alerts_title">Alerte imminente</string>

+
+    <string name="cmas_preview_alert_tone_title">Aperçu du son d’alerte</string>
+    <string name="cmas_preview_alert_tone_summary">Aperçu du son d’alerte</string>
+
+    <string name="cmas_change_settings">Voulez vous vraiment modifier les paramètres ?</string>
+    <string name="cmas_disable_cmas">Vous ne pourrez recevoir aucune alerte si vous désactivez la diffusion cellulaire.</string>
+    <string name="cmas_enable_cmas_failed">Impossible d’ouvrir.</string>
+
+    <string name="enable_repeat_alert_title">Répéter l’alarme</string>
+    <string name="enable_repeat_alert_summary">Pour rappeler périodiquement à l’utilisateur l’alerte non lue</string>
+    <string name="enable_all_alert_title">Toutes les alertes activées</string>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- NOTE: if you change anything about this array, you must make the corresponding change
+         to the array DEFAULT_SMILEY_RES_IDS in MessageListItem.java and to default_smiley_names
+         below. -->
+    <string-array name="default_smiley_texts" translatable="false">
+      <item>:-)</item>   <!-- 0: Happy -->
+      <item>:-(</item>   <!-- 1: Sad -->
+      <item>;-)</item>   <!-- 2: Winking -->
+      <item>:-P</item>   <!-- 3: Tongue sticking out -->
+      <item>=-O</item>   <!-- 4: Surprised -->
+      <item>:-*</item>   <!-- 5: Kissing -->
+      <item>:O</item>    <!-- 6: Yelling -->
+      <item>B-)</item>   <!-- 7: Cool -->
+      <item>:-$</item>   <!-- 8: Money mouth -->
+      <item>:-!</item>   <!-- 9: Foot in mouth -->
+      <item>:-[</item>   <!-- 10: Embarrassed -->
+      <item>O:-)</item>  <!-- 11: Angel -->
+      <item>:-\\</item>  <!-- 12: Undecided -->
+      <item>:\'(</item>  <!-- 13: Crying -->
+      <item>:-X</item>   <!-- 14: Lips are sealed -->
+      <item>:-D</item>   <!-- 15: Laughing -->
+      <item>o_O</item>   <!-- 16: Confused -->
+      <item>&lt;3</item> <!-- 17: Heart -->
+      <item>x-(</item>   <!-- 18: Mad -->
+      <item>:-/</item>   <!-- 19: Smirk -->
+      <item>:-I</item>   <!-- 20: Poker face -->
+    </string-array>
+
+    <!-- NOTE: if you change anything about this array, you must make the corresponding change
+         to the array DEFAULT_SMILEY_RES_IDS in SmileyParser.java and to default_smiley_texts
+         above. -->
+    <string-array name="default_smiley_names">
+        <item>Content</item>                   <!-- 0: :-) -->
+        <item>Triste</item>                     <!-- 1: :-( -->
+        <item>Clin d\u2019œil</item>                 <!-- 2: ;-) -->
+        <item>Tire la langue</item>     <!-- 3: :-P -->
+        <item>Surpris</item>               <!-- 4: =-O -->
+        <item>Bisou</item>                 <!-- 5: :-* -->
+        <item>Hurle</item>                 <!-- 6: :O -->
+        <item>Cool</item>                    <!-- 7: B-) -->
+        <item>Argent</item>             <!-- 8: :-$ -->
+        <item>Embarrassé</item>           <!-- 9: :-! -->
+        <item>Gêné</item>             <!-- 10: :-[ -->
+        <item>Ange</item>                   <!-- 11: O:-) -->
+        <item>Indécis</item>               <!-- 12: :-\\ -->
+        <item>Pleure</item>                  <!-- 13: :\'( -->
+        <item>Motus</item>         <!-- 14: :-X -->
+        <item>Rigole</item>                <!-- 15: :-D -->
+        <item>Confus</item>                <!-- 16: o_O -->
+        <item>Cœur</item>                   <!-- 17: <3 -->
+        <item>Mécontent</item>                     <!-- 18: x-( -->
+        <item>Sourire en coin</item>                   <!-- 19: :-/ -->
+        <item>Lunettes de soleil</item>              <!-- 20: :-I -->
+    </string-array>
+
+    <!-- String to match as no subject and filter out as a subject. For example, if the
+         subject string is "no subject", we won't display that. We'll pretend
+         no subject string was delivered. -->

+        <item>aucun objet</item>
+    </string-array>

--- vendor/mediatek/proprietary/packages/apps/Mms/res/values-pt-rBR/arrays.xml	(revision 0)
+++ vendor/mediatek/proprietary/packages/apps/Mms/res/values-pt-rBR/arrays.xml	(revision 4831)

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- NOTE: if you change anything about this array, you must make the corresponding change
+         to the array DEFAULT_SMILEY_RES_IDS in MessageListItem.java and to default_smiley_names
+         below. -->
+    <string-array name="default_smiley_texts" translatable="false">
+      <item>:-)</item>   <!-- 0: Happy -->
+      <item>:-(</item>   <!-- 1: Sad -->
+      <item>;-)</item>   <!-- 2: Winking -->
+      <item>:-P</item>   <!-- 3: Tongue sticking out -->
+      <item>=-O</item>   <!-- 4: Surprised -->
+      <item>:-*</item>   <!-- 5: Kissing -->
+      <item>:O</item>    <!-- 6: Yelling -->
+      <item>B-)</item>   <!-- 7: Cool -->
+      <item>:-$</item>   <!-- 8: Money mouth -->
+      <item>:-!</item>   <!-- 9: Foot in mouth -->
+      <item>:-[</item>   <!-- 10: Embarrassed -->
+      <item>O:-)</item>  <!-- 11: Angel -->
+      <item>:-\\</item>  <!-- 12: Undecided -->
+      <item>:\'(</item>  <!-- 13: Crying -->
+      <item>:-X</item>   <!-- 14: Lips are sealed -->
+      <item>:-D</item>   <!-- 15: Laughing -->
+      <item>o_O</item>   <!-- 16: Confused -->
+      <item>&lt;3</item> <!-- 17: Heart -->
+      <item>x-(</item>   <!-- 18: Mad -->
+      <item>:-/</item>   <!-- 19: Smirk -->
+      <item>:-I</item>   <!-- 20: Poker face -->
+    </string-array>
+
+    <!-- NOTE: if you change anything about this array, you must make the corresponding change
+         to the array DEFAULT_SMILEY_RES_IDS in SmileyParser.java and to default_smiley_texts
+         above. -->
+    <string-array name="default_smiley_names">
+        <item>Contente</item>                   <!-- 0: :-) -->
+        <item>Triste</item>                     <!-- 1: :-( -->
+        <item>Piscando</item>                 <!-- 2: ;-) -->
+        <item>Língua para fora</item>     <!-- 3: :-P -->
+        <item>Surpreso</item>               <!-- 4: =-O -->
+        <item>Beijando</item>                 <!-- 5: :-* -->
+        <item>Gritando</item>                 <!-- 6: :O -->
+        <item>Tranquilo</item>                    <!-- 7: B-) -->
+        <item>Dinheiro</item>             <!-- 8: :-$ -->
+        <item>Falou demais</item>           <!-- 9: :-! -->
+        <item>Envergonhado</item>             <!-- 10: :-[ -->
+        <item>Anjo</item>                   <!-- 11: O:-) -->
+        <item>Indeciso</item>               <!-- 12: :-\\ -->
+        <item>Choroso</item>                  <!-- 13: :\'( -->
+        <item>Boca fechada</item>         <!-- 14: :-X -->
+        <item>Risonho</item>                <!-- 15: :-D -->
+        <item>Confuso</item>                <!-- 16: o_O -->
+        <item>Coração</item>                   <!-- 17: <3 -->
+        <item>Nervoso</item>                     <!-- 18: x-( -->
+        <item>Sorriso falso</item>                   <!-- 19: :-/ -->
+        <item>Indiferente</item>              <!-- 20: :-I -->
+    </string-array>
+
+    <!-- String to match as no subject and filter out as a subject. For example, if the
+         subject string is "no subject", we won't display that. We'll pretend
+         no subject string was delivered. -->
+    <string-array name="empty_subject_strings">
+        <item>sem assunto</item>
+    </string-array>
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file

Isso evita que você tenha perturbações desnecessárias. \n\nVocê pode marcar um remetente como spam ao manter uma conversa e selecionar o ícone Marcar como spam. +    <string name="ct_om_switch_notification"><xliff:g id="op1">%s</xliff:g> dejará de funcionar temporalmente, y cualquier llamada, SMS o datos en <xliff:g id="op2">%s</xliff:g> cambiarán a <xliff:g id="op3">%s</xliff:g> según corresponda.</string>
+    <!-- The message of toast when switch account between two CDMA cards during a call -->
+    <string name="can_not_switch_account_during_call">No se puede cambiar la SIM preferida para SMS durante la llamada.</string>
+    <!-- The message of alert dialog when switch account but it is not allowed -->
+    <string name="can_not_switch_account_temporarily">No se puede cambiar temporalmente la SIM preferida para los SMS.</string>
+</resources>

+        <item>Cet allumage est prévu dans <xliff:g example="2 hours" id="HOURS">%2$s</xliff:g>.</item>

@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- High voice qulity related pramameters -->
+    <integer-array name="operator_high_params">
+        <!-- Encode type is MediaRecorder.AudioEncoder.AAC -->
+        <item>3</item>
+        <!-- Audio channel is stereo  -->
+        <item>2</item>
+        <!-- Encode bitrate -->
+        <item>128000</item>
+        <!-- Sample rate -->
+        <item>48000</item>
+        <!-- Recording file outputFormat is MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.THREE_GPP -->
+        <item>1</item>
+    </integer-array>
+    <!-- Standard voice qulity related pramameters -->
+    <integer-array name="operator_standard_params">
+        <!-- Encode type is MediaRecorder.AudioEncoder.AAC -->
+        <item>3</item>
+        <!-- Audio channel is stereo  -->
+        <item>2</item>
+        <!-- Encode bitrate -->
+        <item>48000</item>
+        <!-- Sample rate -->
+        <item>32000</item>
+        <!-- Recording file outputFormat is MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.THREE_GPP -->
+        <item>1</item>
+    </integer-array>
+    <!-- Low voice qulity related pramameters -->
+    <integer-array name="operator_low_params">
+        <!-- Encode type is MediaRecorder.AudioEncoder.AMR_NB -->
+        <item>1</item>
+        <!-- Audio channel is mono  -->
+        <item>1</item>
+        <!-- Encode bitrate -->
+        <item>12200</item>
+        <!-- Sample rate -->
+        <item>8000</item>
+        <!-- Recording file outputFormat is MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.AMR_NB -->
+        <item>3</item>
+    </integer-array>
+</resources>

+    <!-- The following sets of strings describe a monthly recurring event, which will repeat
+         on the Nth WEEKDAY of every month. For example, the 3rd Monday of every month, or
+         the last Sunday. These are set up like this to resolve any gender-matching issues
+         that were present in some languages.
+     -->

+    <string-array name="repeat_by_nth_sun">

+         For ex, "Today at 5:00pm-6:00pm" [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="today_at_time_fmt">Aujourd’hui à <xliff:g id="time_interval">%s</xliff:g></string>

+    <plurals name="Nminutes">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-minute reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 minute</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for 2 or more minutes. The actual number of
+             minutes is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g> minutes</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- We use the abbreviation "mins" instead of "minutes" to keep the string short.
+         This is the number of minutes displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 10 minutes would be displayed as '10 mins'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Nmins">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-minute reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 mn</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for 2 or more minutes. The actual number of
+             minutes is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g> mn</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is the number of hours displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 1 hour would be displayed as '1 hour'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation of 'hour' to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Nhours">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-hour reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 heure</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 2 or more hours. The actual number of
+             hours is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g> heures</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is the number of days displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 2 days would be displayed as '2 days'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation of 'day' to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Ndays">
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 1 day. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 jour</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 2 or more days. The actual number of
+             days is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g> jours</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is for displaying the week of the year near the date. Eg. "January, 2011 Week 1" -->

+        <!-- Label for displaying week of the year for all week values [CHAR LIMIT=16] -->
+        <item quantity="other">SEMAINE <xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g></item>
+    </plurals>

+        <!-- Singular form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="one"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> jour à chaque fois</item>
+        <!-- Plural form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="other">Tous les <xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> jours</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- Strings to describe how frequently to repeat an event (e.g. every 5 weeks) -->
+    <plurals name="recurrence_interval_weekly">
+        <!-- Singular form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="one"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> semaine à chaque fois</item>
+        <!-- Plural form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="other">Toutes les <xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> semaines</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- Strings to describe how frequently to repeat an event (e.g. every 5 months) -->
+    <plurals name="recurrence_interval_monthly">
+        <!-- Singular form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="one"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> mois à chaque fois</item>
+        <!-- Plural form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="other">Tous les <xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> mois</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- Strings to describe how frequently to repeat an event (e.g. every 5 years) -->
+    <plurals name="recurrence_interval_yearly">
+        <!-- Singular form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="one"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> année à chaque fois</item>
+        <!-- Plural form [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+        <item quantity="other">Tous les <xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> ans</item>
+    </plurals>
+
+    <!-- Repeat an monthly event on the same day of every month [CHAR LIMIT=20] -->
+    <string name="recurrence_month_pattern_by_day">le même jour tous les mois</string>
+
+    <!-- Specifies that a repeating event to repeat forever (based on the defined frequency) instead of ending at a future date[CHAR LIMIT=20] -->
+    <string name="recurrence_end_continously">Indéfiniment</string>
+    <!-- Specifies that a repeating event to repeat until a certain date[CHAR LIMIT=25] -->
+    <string name="recurrence_end_date_label">Jusqu’à une date</string>
+    <!-- Specifies that a repeating event to repeat until a certain date[CHAR LIMIT=20] -->
+    <string name="recurrence_end_date">Jusqu’au <xliff:g id="date">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Specifies that a repeating event to repeat for a number of times. A repeating event can repeat forever, repeat in a certain frequency until a certain date, or repeat for a number of times. e.g. repeat 10 times and stop. This string is for the last case [CHAR LIMIT=25] -->
+    <string name="recurrence_end_count_label">Pour un nombre d’événements</string>
+
+    <!-- Specifies that a repeating event should repeat for a certain number of iterations. [CHAR LIMIT=20]-->
+    <plurals name="recurrence_end_count">

Index: vendor/mediatek/proprietary/packages/apps/Calendar/res/values-pt-rBR/strings.xml

--- vendor/mediatek/proprietary/packages/apps/Calendar/res/values-pt-rBR/strings.xml	(revision 0)
+++ vendor/mediatek/proprietary/packages/apps/Calendar/res/values-pt-rBR/strings.xml	(revision 4831)

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- This is the label underneath the icon for Calendar -->
+    <string name="app_label">Agenda</string>
+
+    <!-- Shared Labels. These labels are shared among the activities. -->
+    <skip/>
+    <!-- This is the label for the title or name of an event -->
+    <string name="what_label">O quê</string>
+    <!-- This is the label for the location of an event -->
+    <string name="where_label">Onde</string>
+    <!-- This is the label for the time of an event [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+    <string name="when_label">Quando</string>
+    <!-- This is the label for the timezone of an event [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+    <string name="timezone_label">Fuso horário</string>
+    <!-- This is the label for the Guests/Attendees of an event -->
+    <string name="attendees_label">Convidados</string>
+    <!-- Text to show when an event starts on the current day -->
+    <string name="today">Hoje</string>
+    <!-- Text to show when an event starts on the next day -->
+    <string name="tomorrow">amanhã</string>
+    <!-- Text for an event starting on the current day with a start and end time.
+         For ex, "Today at 5:00pm-6:00pm" [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="today_at_time_fmt">Hoje às <xliff:g id="time_interval">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Text for an event starting on the next day with a start and end time.
+         For ex, "Tomorrow at 5:00pm-6:00pm" [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="tomorrow_at_time_fmt">Amanhã às <xliff:g id="time_interval">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Format string for a date and time description.  For ex:
+         "April 19, 2012, 3:00pm - 4:00pm" [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="date_time_fmt">"<xliff:g id="date">%s</xliff:g>, <xliff:g id="time_interval">%s</xliff:g>"</string>
+
+    <!-- Some events repeat daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly.  This is the label
+         for all the choices about how often an event repeats (including the choice
+         of not repeating). -->
+    <string name="repeats_label">Repetição</string>
+    <!-- Title of event when no explicit title is specified by the user -->
+    <string name="no_title_label">(Sem título)</string>
+
+    <!-- Reminder format strings -->
+    <plurals name="Nminutes">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-minute reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 minuto</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for 2 or more minutes. The actual number of
+             minutes is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> minutos</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- We use the abbreviation "mins" instead of "minutes" to keep the string short.
+         This is the number of minutes displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 10 minutes would be displayed as '10 mins'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Nmins">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-minute reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 min</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for 2 or more minutes. The actual number of
+             minutes is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> min</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is the number of hours displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 1 hour would be displayed as '1 hour'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation of 'hour' to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Nhours">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-hour reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 hora</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 2 or more hours. The actual number of
+             hours is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> horas</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is the number of days displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 2 days would be displayed as '2 days'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation of 'day' to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Ndays">
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 1 day. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 dia</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 2 or more days. The actual number of
+             days is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> dias</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is for displaying the week of the year near the date. Eg. "January, 2011 Week 1" -->
+    <plurals name="weekN">
+        <!-- Label for displaying week of the year for all week values [CHAR LIMIT=16] -->
+        <item quantity="other">SEMANA <xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g></item>
+    </plurals>

+    <!-- Part of a description of an repeating event. This part states the date when a repeating
+         event ends. The part before the semi-colon describes how it repeats.
+         e.g. Every 2 weeks; until 1/1/2030 [CHAR LIMIT=21] -->
+    <string name="endByDate">; até <xliff:g id="date">%s</xliff:g>
+</string>
+    <!-- Part of a description of an repeating event. This part how many times the event repeats.
+         The part before the semi-colon describes how it repeats.
+         e.g. Every 2 weeks; for 15 times [CHAR LIMIT=15] -->
+    <plurals name="endByCount">
+        <item quantity="one">; por uma vez
+</item>
+        <item quantity="other">; por <xliff:g id="number">%d</xliff:g> vezes
+</item>
+    </plurals>

+        <item quantity="one">Semanalmente às(aos) <xliff:g id="days_of_week">%2$s</xliff:g></item>
+        <item quantity="other">A cada <xliff:g id="number">%1$d</xliff:g> semanas às(aos) <xliff:g id="days_of_week">%2$s</xliff:g>

+    </integer-array>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- Choices for the "Reminder method" spinner.
+         These must be kept in sync with the reminder_methods_values array.
+         [CHAR LIMIT=10]
+    -->
+    <string-array name="reminder_methods_labels">
+        <item>Notification</item>
+        <item>Email</item>
+        <item>SMS</item>
+        <item>Alarm</item>
+    </string-array>
+
+    <!-- This maps reminder_methods_labels to internal constants. -->
+    <integer-array name="reminder_methods_values" translatable="false">
+        <item>1</item>  <!-- METHOD_ALERT -->
+        <item>2</item>  <!-- METHOD_EMAIL -->
+        <item>3</item>  <!-- METHOD_SMS -->
+        <item>4</item>  <!-- METHOD_ALARM -->
+    </integer-array>
+
+    <!-- Choices for the "Reminder minutes" spinner.
+         These must be kept in sync with the reminder_minutes_values array.
+         For consistency, the format should match what
+         EventViewUtils.constructReminderLabel() generates.  (TODO: eliminate
+         this and just generate the list from reminder_minutes_values?)
+         [CHAR LIMIT=15]
+    -->
+    <string-array name="reminder_minutes_labels">
+        <item>0 minuto</item>
+        <item>1 minuto</item>
+        <item>5 minutos</item>
+        <item>10 minutos</item>
+        <item>15 minutos</item>
+        <item>20 minutos</item>
+        <item>25 minutos</item>
+        <item>30 minutos</item>
+        <item>45 minutos</item>
+        <item>1 hora</item>
+        <item>2 horas</item>
+        <item>3 horas</item>
+        <item>12 horas</item>
+        <item>24 horas</item>
+        <item>2 dias</item>
+        <item>1 semana</item>
+    </string-array>
+
+    <integer-array name="reminder_minutes_values" translatable="false">
+        <item>0</item>
+        <item>1</item>
+        <item>5</item>
+        <item>10</item>
+        <item>15</item>
+        <item>20</item>
+        <item>25</item>
+        <item>30</item>
+        <item>45</item>
+        <item>60</item>
+        <item>120</item>
+        <item>180</item>
+        <item>720</item>
+        <item>1440</item>
+        <item>2880</item>
+        <item>10080</item>
+    </integer-array>
+
+  <!-- Choices for the "Reminder minutes" spinner in the settings.
+         These must be kept in sync with the preferences_default_reminder_values array.
+         [CHAR LIMIT=12]
+    -->
+       <string-array name="preferences_default_reminder_labels">
+        <item>Nenhum</item>
+        <item>1 minuto</item>
+        <item>1 minuto</item>
+        <item>5 minutos</item>
+        <item>10 minutos</item>

+         except that the first element "Only this event" is removed.  This
+         array exists to work-around a bug in the CalendarProvider and sync
+         code where you can't delete one instance of a repeating event that
+         was created on the phone until that event has been synced to the server.
+     -->

+        <item>REPEAT WEEKLY</item>
+        <item>REPEAT MONTHLY</item>
+        <item>REPEAT YEARLY</item>
+    </string-array>
+
+    <!-- The following sets of strings describe a monthly recurring event, which will repeat
+         on the Nth WEEKDAY of every month. For example, the 3rd Monday of every month, or
+         the last Sunday. These are set up like this to resolve any gender-matching issues
+         that were present in some languages.
+     -->
+    <!-- Repeat a monthly event on the same nth day of every Sunday. [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+    <string-array name="repeat_by_nth_sun">

+        <item>toda quarta terça\u2011feira</item>
+        <item>toda última terça\u2011feira</item>
+    </string-array>
+    <!-- Repeat a monthly event on the same nth day of every Tuesday. [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->

+        <item>todo terceiro sábado</item>
+        <item>Apenas se for negado</item>

+        <item>todo segundo sábado</item>

+        <item>todo terceiro domingo</item>

+    <string-array name="repeat_by_nth_thurs">

+    <!-- This is the same array as above (the "delete_repeating_labels" array,
+         except that the first element "Only this event" is removed.  This
+         array exists to work-around a bug in the CalendarProvider and sync
+         code where you can't delete one instance of a repeating event that
+         was created on the phone until that event has been synced to the server.
+     -->

+    <!-- The following sets of strings describe a monthly recurring event, which will repeat
+         on the Nth WEEKDAY of every month. For example, the 3rd Monday of every month, or
+         the last Sunday. These are set up like this to resolve any gender-matching issues
+         that were present in some languages.
+     -->

+    <!-- The following sets of strings describe a monthly recurring event, which will repeat
+         on the Nth WEEKDAY of every month. For example, the 3rd Monday of every month, or
+         the last Sunday. These are set up like this to resolve any gender-matching issues
+         that were present in some languages.
+     -->

+    <!-- Reminder format strings -->
+    <plurals name="Nminutes">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-minute reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 minuto</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for 2 or more minutes. The actual number of
+             minutes is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g> minutos</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- We use the abbreviation "mins" instead of "minutes" to keep the string short.
+         This is the number of minutes displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 10 minutes would be displayed as '10 mins'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Nmins">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-minute reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 minuto</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for 2 or more minutes. The actual number of
+             minutes is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g> minutos</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is the number of hours displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 1 hour would be displayed as '1 hour'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation of 'hour' to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Nhours">
+        <!-- This is the label for a 1-hour reminder. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 hora</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 2 or more hours. The actual number of
+             hours is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g> horas</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is the number of days displayed for a calendar reminder.  For example,
+         a reminder of 2 days would be displayed as '2 days'.  The translation
+         should use the shortest acceptable abbreviation of 'day' to save space. -->
+    <plurals name="Ndays">
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 1 day. -->
+        <item quantity="one">1 día</item>
+        <!-- This is the label for a reminder of 2 or more days. The actual number of
+             days is a parameter. -->
+        <item quantity="other"><xliff:g id="COUNT">%d</xliff:g> días</item>
+    </plurals>
+    <!-- This is for displaying the week of the year near the date. Eg. "January, 2011 Week 1" -->
+    <plurals name="weekN">
+        <!-- Label for displaying week of the year for all week values [CHAR LIMIT=16] -->
+        <item quantity="other">SEMANA <xliff:g id="count">%d</xliff:g></item>
+    </plurals>

+        <item>3</item>

+        <!-- Encode bitrate -->
+        <item>128000</item>

+        <item>1</item>
+    </integer-array>

+        <item>2</item>

+        <!-- Sample rate -->
+        <item>32000</item>
+        <!-- Recording file outputFormat is MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.THREE_GPP -->
+        <item>1</item>
+    </integer-array>

+        <item>1</item>

+        <item>12200</item>
+        <!-- Sample rate -->
+        <item>8000</item>
+        <!-- Recording file outputFormat is MediaRecorder.OutputFormat.AMR_NB -->
+        <item>3</item>
+    </integer-array>
+</resources>

+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_1month">Un mois</string>

+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_all">Tous</string>
+
+    <string name="account_manager_type_exchange" translatable="false">com.android.exchange</string>
+    <string name="authority_email_provider" translatable="false">com.android.email.provider</string>
+
+    <!-- Title for notification warning about an authentication error [CHAR LIMIT=40]  -->
+    <string name="auth_error_notification_title">Erreur d’authentification</string>
+
+    <!-- text for notification warning about an authentication error [CHAR LIMIT=60]  -->
+    <string name="auth_error_notification_text">Appuyer pour modifier les paramètres du compte <xliff:g id="account">%s</xliff:g></string>
+
+    <!-- Message displayed when there is no application to handle the settings option. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="email_settings_not_available">Réactivez l’application E\u2011mail pour afficher les paramètres.</string>
+
+</resources>

+    <!-- The following are a list of policies that the user's server requires and that are
+         in force.  We will list them separated by commas, as required -->
+    <!-- A policy in which attachments aren't allowed to be downloaded [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->

+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->

+    <!-- The following is a policy that may or not be supported on a particular device -->
+    <!-- A policy in which the device requires device or sd card encryption [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_encryption">Requerer criptografia de dispositivos</string>
+
+
+    <!--  The window length strings below MUST remain in sync with those in com.android.email -->
+    <!-- In account setup options & account settings screens (exchange), sync window length; this
+        implies loading a 'reasonable' number of messages [CHAR LIMIT=25] -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_auto">Automático</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->

+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_2weeks">Duas semanas</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_1month">Um mês</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_all">Tudo</string>
+
+    <string name="account_manager_type_exchange" translatable="false">com.android.exchange</string>
+    <string name="authority_email_provider" translatable="false">com.android.email.provider</string>
+
+    <!-- Title for notification warning about an authentication error [CHAR LIMIT=40]  -->
+    <string name="auth_error_notification_title">Erro de autenticação</string>
+
+    <!-- text for notification warning about an authentication error [CHAR LIMIT=60]  -->
+    <string name="auth_error_notification_text">Toque para editar as configurações de conta para <xliff:g id="account">%s</xliff:g></string>
+
+    <!-- Message displayed when there is no application to handle the settings option. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="email_settings_not_available">Reativar o aplicativo de e\u2011mail para visualizar as configurações.</string>
+
+</resources>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">

+    <!-- Deprecated strings - Move the identifiers to this section, mark as

+        bulk operation. -->

+    <string name="exchange_eas_name" translatable="false">Exchange</string>
+    <!-- Long name of Microsoft Exchange account type; used by AccountManager -->
+    <string name="exchange_name_alternate">Microsoft Exchange ActiveSync</string>
+
+    <!-- Message subject for meeting accepted response. This will be followed
+        by a colon and the title of the meeting (i.e. the title of the meeting becomes
+        part of the subject of the message that's sent) -->
+    <string name="meeting_accepted">Accepted: <xliff:g id="subject">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Message subject for meeting declined response. This is followed by
+        a colon and the title of the meeting (i.e. the title of the meeting becomes
+        part of the subject of the message that's sent) -->
+    <string name="meeting_declined">Declined: <xliff:g id="subject">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Message subject for meeting tentative response. This is followed by
+        a colon and the title of the meeting (i.e. the title of the meeting becomes
+        part of the subject of the message that's sent) -->
+    <string name="meeting_tentative">Tentative: <xliff:g id="subject">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Message subject for a canceled meeting email. This is followed by a
+        colon and the title of the meeting (i.e. the title of the meeting becomes
+        part of the subject of the message that's sent) -->
+    <string name="meeting_canceled">Cancelled: <xliff:g id="subject">%s</xliff:g> </string>
+    <!-- Message subject for an updated meeting email. This is followed by a
+        colon and the title of the meeting (i.e. the title of the meeting becomes
+        part of the subject of the message that's sent) -->
+    <string name="meeting_updated">Updated: <xliff:g id="subject">%s</xliff:g></string>
+
+    <!-- Indicate when a meeting takes place. This is presented in in bullet
+        form, as in, "When: xxx" followed by "Where: xxx" -->
+    <string name="meeting_when">When: <xliff:g id="when">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Indicate where a meeting takes place. This is presented in in bullet
+        form, as in, "When: xxx" followed by "Where: xxx" -->
+    <string name="meeting_where">Where: <xliff:g id="where">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Indicate that a meeting is recurring. This would normally be presented
+        after "When: xxx", e.g. "When: Tue, Mar 10, 2010 at 2:30pm (recurring)" -->
+    <string name="meeting_recurring">When: <xliff:g example="Tue, Mar 10, 2010 at 2:30 pm" id="eventdate">%s</xliff:g> (recurring)</string>
+    <!-- Indicate that a meeting lasts all day. This would normally be presented
+        after "When: xxx", e.g. "When: Tue, Mar 10, 2010 (all day)" -->
+    <string name="meeting_allday">When: <xliff:g example="Tue, Mar 10, 2010 " id="eventdate">%s</xliff:g> (all day)</string>
+    <!-- Indicate that a meeting lasts all day and is recurring. This would normally be presented
+        after "When: xxx", e.g. "When: Tue, Mar 10, 2010 (all day, recurring)" -->
+    <string name="meeting_allday_recurring">When: <xliff:g example="Tue, Mar 10, 2010 " id="eventdate">%s</xliff:g> (all day, recurring)</string>
+
+    <!-- The name of this APK as shown in manage applications settings. [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+    <string name="app_name">Exchange Services</string>
+
+    <!-- Used as the body text of a message reporting to an attendee that a
+        specific instance of a recurring meeting has been canceled -->
+    <string name="exception_cancel">This event has been cancelled for: <xliff:g id="date">%s</xliff:g> </string>
+    <!-- Used as the body text of a message reporting to an attendee that a
+        specific instance of a recurring meeting has been changed -->
+    <string name="exception_updated">The details of this event have been changed for: <xliff:g id="date">%s</xliff:g></string>
+
+    <!-- The following are a list of policies that the user's server might require, but that can't
+        be enforced by our device.  We will list them separated by commas, as required -->
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not have a storage card [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->

+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow wifi communications [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_wifi">Don\\u2019t allow Wi\u2011Fi</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow text messaging [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_text_messaging">Don\\u2019t allow text messaging</string>

+    <!-- A policy in which the device may allow infrared communications [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_irda">Don\\u2019t allow infrared communications</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may allow HTML email to be received [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_html">Don\\u2019t allow HTML email</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow the user of web browsers [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_browser">Don\\u2019t allow browsers</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow the receipt of consumer email
+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_consumer_email">Don\\u2019t allow consumer email</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow internet connection sharing
+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_internet_sharing">Don\\u2019t allow internet sharing</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which messages must be in SMIME format [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_smime">Require SMIME messages</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device's bluetooth capabilities are restricted [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_bluetooth_restricted">Restrict Bluetooth usage</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device blocks specified applications [CHAR LIMIT=50]-->
+    <string name="policy_app_blacklist">Don\u2019t allow specified apps</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device allows only specified applications [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_app_whitelist">Allow only specified apps</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device limits the amount of text that can be displayed for a
+        given message [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_text_truncation">Restrict text email size</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device limits the amount of HTML text that can be displayed for a
+        given message [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_html_truncation">Restrict HTML email size</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device requires device or sd card encryption [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_sd_encryption">Require SD card encryption</string>
+
+    <!-- The following are a list of policies that the user's server requires and that are
+         in force.  We will list them separated by commas, as required -->
+    <!-- A policy in which attachments aren't allowed to be downloaded [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_attachments">Don\\u2019t allow attachments</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device restricts the size of attachments that can be downloaded
+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_max_attachment_size">Restrict attachment size</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may only sync manually while roaming [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->

+    <!-- A policy in which the device requires device or sd card encryption [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_encryption">Require device encryption</string>
+

+        form, as in, "When: xxx" followed by "Where: xxx" -->
+    <string name="meeting_where">Dónde: <xliff:g id="where">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Indicate that a meeting is recurring. This would normally be presented
+        after "When: xxx", e.g. "When: Tue, Mar 10, 2010 at 2:30pm (recurring)" -->
+    <string name="meeting_recurring">Cuándo: <xliff:g example="Tue, Mar 10, 2010 at 2:30 pm" id="eventdate">%s</xliff:g> (recurrente)</string>
+    <!-- Indicate that a meeting lasts all day. This would normally be presented
+        after "When: xxx", e.g. "When: Tue, Mar 10, 2010 (all day)" -->
+    <string name="meeting_allday">Cuándo: <xliff:g example="Tue, Mar 10, 2010 " id="eventdate">%s</xliff:g> (todo el día)</string>
+    <!-- Indicate that a meeting lasts all day and is recurring. This would normally be presented
+        after "When: xxx", e.g. "When: Tue, Mar 10, 2010 (all day, recurring)" -->
+    <string name="meeting_allday_recurring">Cuándo: <xliff:g example="Tue, Mar 10, 2010 " id="eventdate">%s</xliff:g> (todo el día, repetido)</string>
+
+    <!-- The name of this APK as shown in manage applications settings. [CHAR LIMIT=30] -->
+    <string name="app_name">Intercambiar servicios</string>
+
+    <!-- Used as the body text of a message reporting to an attendee that a
+        specific instance of a recurring meeting has been canceled -->
+    <string name="exception_cancel">Este evento se canceló el día: <xliff:g id="date">%s</xliff:g></string>
+    <!-- Used as the body text of a message reporting to an attendee that a
+        specific instance of a recurring meeting has been changed -->
+    <string name="exception_updated">Este evento se pasó al día: <xliff:g id="date">%s</xliff:g></string>
+
+    <!-- The following are a list of policies that the user's server might require, but that can't
+        be enforced by our device.  We will list them separated by commas, as required -->
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not have a storage card [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_storage_cards">No permitir tarjetas de almacenamiento</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not have unsigned applications installed
+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_unsigned_apps">No permitir aplicaciones sin firmar</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow application installation via an unsigned
+        installer [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_unsigned_installers">No permitir instaladores de aplicaciones sin firmar</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow wifi communications [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_wifi">No permitir Wi\u2011Fi</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow text messaging [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_text_messaging">No permitir mensajes de texto</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow POP3 or IMAP email accounts [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_pop_imap">No permitir cuentas POP3 o IMAP</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may allow infrared communications [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_irda">No permitir comunicación por infrarrojos</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may allow HTML email to be received [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_html">No permitir correos electrónicos HTML</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow the user of web browsers [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_browser">No permitir el uso de navegadores</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow the receipt of consumer email
+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_consumer_email">No permitir correos comerciales</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may not allow internet connection sharing
+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_internet_sharing">No permitir compartir Internet</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which messages must be in SMIME format [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_smime">Se requieren mensajes SMIME</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device's bluetooth capabilities are restricted [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_bluetooth_restricted">Restringir uso de Bluetooth</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device blocks specified applications [CHAR LIMIT=50]-->
+    <string name="policy_app_blacklist">No permitir aplicaciones específicas</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device allows only specified applications [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_app_whitelist">Permitir sólo aplicaciones específicas</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device limits the amount of text that can be displayed for a
+        given message [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_text_truncation">Restringir tamaño de correo electrónico de texto</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device limits the amount of HTML text that can be displayed for a
+        given message [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_html_truncation">Restringir tamaño de correo electrónico HTML</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device requires device or sd card encryption [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_sd_encryption">Se requiere cifrado de tarjeta SD</string>
+
+    <!-- The following are a list of policies that the user's server requires and that are
+         in force.  We will list them separated by commas, as required -->
+    <!-- A policy in which attachments aren't allowed to be downloaded [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_dont_allow_attachments">No permitir archivos adjuntos</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device restricts the size of attachments that can be downloaded
+        [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_max_attachment_size">Restringir el tamaño de archivos adjuntos</string>
+    <!-- A policy in which the device may only sync manually while roaming [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_manual_sync_roaming">Permitir sincronización manual sólo en roaming</string>
+
+    <!-- The following is a policy that may or not be supported on a particular device -->
+    <!-- A policy in which the device requires device or sd card encryption [CHAR LIMIT=50] -->
+    <string name="policy_require_encryption">Requiere cifrado del dispositivo</string>
+
+
+    <!--  The window length strings below MUST remain in sync with those in com.android.email -->
+    <!-- In account setup options & account settings screens (exchange), sync window length; this
+        implies loading a 'reasonable' number of messages [CHAR LIMIT=25] -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_auto">Automático</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_1day">Un día</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_3days">Tres días</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_1week">Una semana</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_2weeks">Dos semanas</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_1month">Un mes</string>
+    <!-- A sync window length setting (i.e. load messages this far back) [CHAR LIMIT=25]  -->
+    <string name="account_setup_options_mail_window_all">Todos</string>
+
+    <string name="account_manager_type_exchange" translatable="false">com.android.exchange</string>
+    <string name="authority_email_provider" translatable="false">com.android.email.provider</string>

+    <!-- Message displayed when there is no application to handle the settings option. [CHAR LIMIT=NONE] -->
+    <string name="email_settings_not_available">Vuelva a activar la aplicación de correo electrónico para ver los ajustes</string>

+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" standalone="no"?>
+<resources xmlns:xliff="urn:oasis:names:tc:xliff:document:1.2">
+    <!-- Title of the storage activity for DRM content. -->
+    <string name="app_label">Conteúdo protegido por DRM</string>
+
+    <!-- Title of the permission that allows access to DRM content -->
+    <string name="permlab_accessDrm">Acessar o conteúdo DRM.</string>
+
+    <!-- Description of the permission that allows access to DRM content -->
+    <string name="permdesc_accessDrm">Permite que o aplicativo acesse conteúdo protegido por DRM.</string>
+
+    <!-- Title of the permission that allows installation of DRM content -->
+    <string name="permlab_installDrm">Instalar conteúdos DRM.</string>
+
+    <!-- Description of the permission that allows installation of DRM content -->
+    <string name="permdesc_installDrm">Permite que o aplicativo instale conteúdo protegido por DRM.</string>
+</resources>
\ No newline at end of file
